tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After two years into our marriage we decided to have a checkup before starting a family which unravelled the truth that things were far from ok and the only option available for us was IVF. Our gynaecologist recommended Dr.Sumana.

My first impression of her was a calm, confident and practical person. She was very patient in explaining the treatment and very realistic about the success rates. She told things as is without any sugar coating this helped us to be prepared mentally.

When we started with the treatment we had regular scans for the doctor to assess if there was any use in progressing further. This made me respect her more cause she was thinking about the patient.
Moreover my ovaries were precariously placed but Dr. Sumana’s efficiency ensured I had no complications.

Today after one failed IVF and a successful FET am pregnant. I thank God for helping me meet the right doctor. I thank Dr.Sumana for all her patience and guidance throughout this journey.

I would strongly recommend her to anyone who is seeking help in getting their family extended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We were trying to extend our family for 2 yrs and it was unexplained infertility in our case. I got to know about cloud nine Fertility team. And i decided to meet Dr. Sumana Gurunath one fine day. 
The very first meeting gave us confidence in the doctor and the treatment.
She would explain the procedure how things work if you want to conceive and the treatment options.
Very cool and calm and knows her job very well.
.I would recommend her to everyone who is seeking help in getting their family extended.

tags: None
review:
Eight years into our marriage,and more than eighty visits to different Doctors in the city,yet the same reply-"yours is a case on unexplained infertility-no medicine can help you,jus keep faith,keep trying".
We had reached a stage where ADOPTION became a topic of our discussion,when one fine day we came to know of Dr.Sumuna Gurunath,our ANGEL IN DISGUISE.
Very first visit to her was comforting and we received positive vibes from her.she gave us a patient listening and assured to do the best she can.
Today we are proud parents of our bundle of joy-a cute little boy.
No words can express our feeling of gratitude for our DR.
Her sincerity to her work and pacifying nature to her patients are unparalleled.
We will remain indebted to you for a lifetime what you did for us.
Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am not  the one usually write reviews. But this time I thought I should really do it because this would really help someone.we were married for 5 years and planned to have baby after 2 years of marriage.we both are really good health and usually we have very healthy lifestyle. we do practice yoga stress free life. inspite of all this we struggled to conceive for 3 years with no valid medical reasons.
Someone from our friends circle suggested us to meet Sumana mam. when we met her she examined all our reports and suggested to go for IUI. we tried it, it didnt work then we  took a break for 6 months and then decided to go for IVF. And its the success in 2 nd attempt.
we are blessed with baby boy  4 month back. we are really thankful to Sumana mam.she suggested/guided us to make right decision.She is the best one to consult if you are waiting for joy to coming in your life.
I am really happy with the nurses and caring staff service.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife facing problem of PCOD. So we consulted  Dr. sumana Gurunath. Doctor  suggested IVF with Donar eggs, Almost it cost more than 4 laks. But we follwed mediccines and taken care, my wife, very Carefuly. I Resigned my job taken care, my wife. But finally, it was not successful. we got after fertilization one A-Grade, 2- B-grade Embryos. But was not successful. Finally, the doctor suggested we tried our level best remaining god will take care. *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ******* My suggestion, once we are planning for IVF, depends on your Budget plan it. Otherwise its total loss of money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I was referred to Dr.Sumana Gurunath by my gyn. Our first meet was so impressive. She spent her valuable time and also she is very peculiar in getting the history. She was amazing Dr whom I can't forget in my life. Whenever she start the work, she used to tell the percentage of success associated with that treatment (without any extra coat). After nearly 5 months of treatment, my kit showed positive. Happy for mam. I would really thank her a lot. *** ** ********* ** ********* ** **** ** she hears our words carefully. I am blessed to have her in my treatment. I personally recommend her. She is a Lady legend:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We wanted to plan baby as we got married late in age of 35. but within 1 year of marriage we understood that there is some complications with us. We were referred by our relative Gynecologist to Dr. Sumana. Dr. sumana she talked with very patiently and looked in our all reports. She explained the problem and how to medically deal with it. 
We followed her all the suggestions and the result was successful. We got success in 1st attempt of ICSI. Dr. Sumana looked in to my health till 1st trimester of pregnancy and help me out with all my initial complications.

****** *** ********* *** ******* ****** *** *********** ******* ** ****** She understand the patient need very well and advise accordingly.
She is very much dedicated to her patient and put her all efforts to make 100% success in her attempt. I liked the way she have treated me and satisfied with it. We got the right person at the beginning and things went smooth for us with Dr. Sumana. There is no words to explain how much happy we are now.  We are very much thankful of Dr sumana for helping in bringing happiness in our life.
Thank you so much Dr. Sumana.

I rate 5/5 and 100% recommend to all the couples who are facing complications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would like to thank doctor first coz of her treatment I conceived naturally and gave birth to a cute girl baby this June 2018. I was trying for baby from 5 years... But could not be success. 
now I am enjoying motherhood coz of her treatment. Thank you very much doctor...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is excellent ..I was treated for  pcod problem by dr Sumana and conceived naturally thru her expertise .. even though  I stay very far from Malleshwaram but still I wanted to get my pregnancy treatment done oly by her.. friendly n very educated.. when I walk out of her office I come out wit a smile .. treatments r gud * *********  .. I would recommend Cloudnine and dr Sumana to all my friends who want to enjoy the d journey of motherhood.. thank u dr Sumana

tags: None
review: Our first visit to her was very comforting. She is a very calm,  kind,  supportive n her dedication n patience in treating n explaining every problems is outstanding n that has created positive vibes within us.  A very promising doctor to consult with.

review: Dr. Sumana Gurunath has been a miracle women for us. She exactly knows the issue & would treat the problem as per needs no less no more. Surely recommend her without any doubts for any pregnancy related issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly with their patients. .....and giving right treatment for the right time..😊.......but to Book an appointment it lil bit difficult we have to book an appointment before 2 days in emergencies also they will not booked our appointment. .......😐

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was very Good Experience with Doctor Sumana. She is very Friendly and Patient Doc.The Doc is very good  and hear my problem and replay us Gently. The way she attends patients is very good she will explain very clearly about problem root cause and Remedie for that.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Married for 6 years with unexplained infertility...i had 2 failed IUI and 1 failed IVF cycle in very well known fertility centre..We have a gap of an year and we were recommended by a friend to consult Dr Sumana..She took a lot of time and patience to understand our case and suggested few tests to rule out if there could be any known reason for the fertility issues..Post which we underwent a IVF cycle and i conceived in the first attempt..My pregnancy was great and i am now a mother of a baby girl who turned 5 months old...There isn't a day we don't thank Dr Sumana in our hearts ..She gave us the biggest gift of our lives.... Parenthood...Thank you Sumana Ma'am...we truly admire your knowledge, experience and you are a very genuine person and we respect you immensely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** She listens to what we have to say very patiently, she explains things very thoroughly. Patience and organisation skills are the best qualities of Dr Sumana. She puts efforts to make things possible and consider every patient's issues very personally and provide the treatment. She doesn't sugar coat the things, speaks very straightforward. I totally recommend Dr Sumana for anyone who is facing fertility issues and looking for solutions. Dr Sumana and her team (at Cloudnine Malleswaram) is the best team.

tags: None
review: She was such an angel.. Listened and cared abt all my problems and suggested and kept us confident abt my pregnancy till it succeeds.. She is more of a practical person who tells whatever the fact is.. I'm blessed to have met Dr. Sumana Gurunath nd now I'm 3 months pregnant 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
We have ben consulting the Doctor Sumana Gurunath since Feb2020 for IVF treatment. *** *** ********* *** ************ ***** Prior to this, we consulted so many doctors for the infertility and almost lost hope that we may not become parents. 

Finally with one our relatives advise & recommendation, we met the Doctor Sumana Gurunath at Cloud9 Hospital, Malleswaram, Bangalore. She's been treating us very nicely from the day one. And surprisingly my wife conceived and she's 4th month now with twin babies. Our entire family is so happy for this. Thanks a lot to a very well experienced Dr. Sumana Gurunath. 

Only thing is the pre & post treatment is pretty costly as far as my financial background is concerned. But then we are so happy. Thanks to Sumana Ma'am and Cloud9 team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sumana Gurunath is very friendly, she explains everything clearly about the treatment, she gives us positivity and guides us with her kind gesture. We are very happy with the way the whole, very well organised system works. Thank you

review:
Motherhood is the biggest gamble in the world. It is the glorious life force. It's huge and scary — it's an act of infinite optimism. A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
And for me Dr.SUMANA GURUNATH has supported me a lot to cherish each and every moment during my pregnancy.
